Description:
New modern house - close to everything!
Attention! First home buyers, Down sizers and Investors this exciting new modern B/V low maintenance house has it all, with a great location and room to fit a caravan, boat, trailer or the lot!! What a bonus!
With open plan living contains an extra large shower in the master ensuite with walk in robe and built-ins in bedrooms 2 and 3. A modern kitchen with handy double pull out bin drawer for extra tidyness, walk in pantry and split system heating/cooling for full comfort. Modern pendant lighting over island bench and d/lights to match, all is covered here with attention to detail. 2 TV aerial inputs on walls for neatness, internal double garage for added convenience, this townhouse is sure to please, get your skates on call us now!

Description:
Still available via private inspection: Spacious Split Level Living
Presenting a great opportunity to purchase a spacious split level residence with stunning high ceilings and two renovated bathrooms that both have glorious high ceilings also. This inviting home is privately and securely tucked away at the rear of an elevated cul-de-sac surrounded by beautifully landscaped gardens.
The first of two living spaces offer loads of sunlight and features those amazing high ceilings. The second living is a large open space where you'll also find the kitchen and dining area. This zone also opens up out to the sunny deck, making it a brilliant area to entertain.
This warm and inviting kitchen offers quality Westinghouse stainless-steel appliances including gas cooktop, electric wall oven, dishwasher and all tied together with a stylish tiled splash-back.
The accommodation features four sizeable bedrooms, three of which have walk-in robes whilst the fourth has built-in robes. The bedrooms are complemented a renovated bathroom and a fully renovated ensuite off the master bedroom.
Other features include new light fixtures, ducted cooling, gas heating, 6 water tanks, excellent storage throughout plus an extra lockable room for storage outside under the deck.
This wonderful home is enhanced by its prime location, perfect for accessing popular Lansell Shopping Centre and just a short distance further into the centre of Bendigo, a hub of cosmopolitan delights.
Come and inspect this property today and discover it's even better in person.

Description:
Neat as a Pin with Excellent Shedding
No need to lift a finger here! This well-located weatherboard home has been completely renovated with a fresh new look and is now a neat and comfortable home to suit young families, downsizers or investors. Features include:
Three good size bedrooms, all fitted with split system air conditioners
Open plan lounge room/kitchen/meals area
Updated kitchen with gas stove and vinyl plank flooring
Updated bathroom with a large shower and vanity, plus separate toilet
Great 7m x 6m (approx.) Colorbond shed with concrete floor and power
Side access to drive into the backyard and shed
Carport adjoining the shed, as well as a double carport at the front of the home allowing room for the boat, the camper trailer, motorbikes, a workshop etc
Deck and pergola overlooking the rear yard which still has space to mow in the cricket pitch
New carpet
Recently painted throughout
Set in a quiet, family-friendly street with all the convenience of Kangaroo Flat and just an hour and a half to Melbourne. This property is sure to appeal to range of buyers so book your private inspection today.

Description:
2 Months Young
Virtual Tour available by clicking link
Directions: Located off the service road opposite Bunnings. Turn into Kingerlee Drive then left in Loriini Place.
Why go through the process and stress of building? Welcome home to this very beautiful new build. Sitting on a corner allotment allowing access to the rear yard is this 3-bedroom, 2 bathroom home. The main bedroom has a large walk in robe and beautifully appointed ensuite. The remaining two bedrooms both have built in robes.
The kitchen is the heart of this home. With the open plan kitchen, lounge and meals area, access to the yard for entertaining or simply watching the children play is easy. The yard is fully fenced and private. There is potential to build a shed and have rear access to the property.
Inside Features:
3 Spacious bedrooms, all with built in robes
Master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite
Open plan kitchen, dining and second living area
Separate lounge
Modern large kitchen with gas hot plates and electric oven
Ducted gas heating
Ducted evaporative cooling
Walk through pantry with an abundance of storage
Outside Features:
Fully fenced rear yard
Access to rear yard
Low maintenance block
Located within a short drive to Lansell shopping centre, schools, public transport and sporting grounds this home will appeal to many buyers.

Description:
A proposition for investors & developers (STCA)
This property represents an ideal proposition for investors and developers. Not only does this three-bedroom, 1950's weatherboard home already have tenants until November 2020, but it's on a huge 949m2 allotment! That means it has subdivision potential too (STCA)!
Conveniently located within walking distance of Lansell Square shopping centre and only a five-minute drive to schools, medical clinics and Kangaroo Flat CBD. The Gurri Wanyarra Wellbeing Centre is also close by as is the train station and public transport.
The house itself is well maintained with an open plan kitchen/dining and living area. The kitchen is comprised of an electric oven, gas cook top and plenty of bench space. Each of the bedrooms easily accommodates a queen size bed and ensemble. Bedrooms one and two have built-in robes. In the living area is a gas space heater to keep you warm during the colder weather and a refrigerated air conditioner cools you off during the warmer months. A single garage out the back has power and can be used to either house a car or as a workshop.
Current rent per week is: $270

Description:
WHEN CONVENIENCE MEETS LIFESTYLE!
Located in the heart of Kangaroo Flat is this fantastic opportunity for all walks of life and offers one lucky purchaser comfort and convenience from the moment they pick up the keys!
Three bedrooms occupy the residence. The large master bedroom is ideally located at the rear of the home to offer privacy and is made complete with Walk in Robe and ensuite bathroom. The other two bedrooms of the home are located in the central hallway and are both generous in size, they both contain built in robes. All three bedrooms contain ceiling fans.
At the front of the home you will find a large Kitchen, living and dining area where you and your family (or your tenants family) will be spending most of your time together, Flooded with natural light and offering a large space for activities. The kitchen comes well equipped with ample storage featuring a large walk in pantry, a dishwasher and an electric oven. Off this area you will find the laundry area. A family bathroom can be found in the central hallway complete with bath. An additional lounge room and sunroom/parents retreat can be found heading towards the rear of the home proving the divide between children and adults that is so desperately needed at times!
Other features of the home include: Ducted cooling, split system heating and cooling in the front lounge area, gas wall furnace in the rear lounge area, north facing rear yard, rear access & garden shed.
Outside the property you will find the home is positioned to maximize the land around it. Offering 676m2 (approx) but feeling like it offers you double. An outdoor entertaining area can be found off the sun-room for entertaining. A single undercover carport can be found and used for element protection while a further 2 cars can fit comfortably behind the gate located at the front of the home offering secure off street parking.
Your new home is located a hop skip & jump away from Lansell Square shopping plaza, IGA Kangaroo Flat & ALDI Kangaroo Flat and is an mere 10 minute drive from Bendigo CBD. Crusoe College, Big Hill Primary School & Kangaroo Flat Primary School are all within close proximity and bus stops are
located at the end of the street. With all these reasons and then some, the property is ideal for first home owners looking to enter the market, downsizers looking to be close to amenities or investors looking to capitalize on a property suitable for a large audience.

Description:
Affordable Home In A Great Location
New to the market and situated in a tightly held pocket of Kangaroo Flat is this very well presented brick veneer home set on a 728m2 low maintenance corner allotment which has the added bonus of possible STCA subdivision potential.
The house includes three bedrooms all with built in robes and are serviced by a central bathroom. The living areas features a formal lounge, good sized kitchen with electric oven and gas cooktop. Sliding doors off the family dining give access to the backyard
and the outside undercover area for entertaining family and friends all year round.
A great opportunity exists for all segments of the market whether you are looking to invest, buy your first home or retirees looking to downsize. This very attractive property would be a sound investment in any property portfolio.
Located close to Kangaroo Flat CBD, sporting amenities, schools and an easy commute to Melbourne, properties like this one will not sit for long. be quick to inspect this very attractive proposition.

Address: 282 MacKenzie Street West Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555
Description:
Central Kangaroo Flat Family Winner.
INSPECTION BY APPOINTMENT CONTACT JESSE FORBES 0477277600
A superb property in a superb location, 282 MacKenzie Street West provides true ease of living.
A primary school around the corner, a local park down the right or a short drive to Kangaroo Flat's shopping precinct or Bendigo CBD there is lots to love about its lifestyle offerings.
Set on a generous approx. 800m2 block sits this neatly presented 1970s style cream brick home offering plenty of natural light and recent updates.
A spacious lounge room with large windows, ornate cornices, built-in robes, ceiling fans and an abundance of storage options throughout.
Fresh touches to the bathroom and new wardrobes in the bedrooms add to the appeal of the home while the floor plan and original fittings provides the ideal opportunity to continue adding your style if you wish.
Control the climate all year round with ease thanks to refrigerated cooling and ducted gas heating.
The home continues to shine outdoors with its large undercover entertaining patio, secure fencing, established garden beds with fruit trees and plenty of shade, and a garden shed.
You'll be impressed with the 7m x 6m concreted and powered shed complete with log woodfire providing the ideal man cave and additional off-street parking options with the double carport.
Invest and bring in a rental income or move right in and plan for the future, contact agent Jesse Forbes for an inspection.

Description:
Why build a new home with this price
Are you looking for your next family home or investment? This beautifully presented home offers you peace and security in this tightly held location.
With neutral tones and furnishing this home is welcoming. There are four good sized bedrooms, main with his and hers walk in robes and ensuite. The bright and open kitchen is positioned to be the heart of the home that flows seamlessly out to an undercover entertaining area and family friendly backyard.
A well-designed drive through garage to the rear yard can also accommodate a trailer or pop top caravan for secure storage.
With separate living areas the family will be spoilt for choices. Make sure you do not miss out on this fantastic home.
Inside Features:
Large main bedroom with his/hers walk through robe and ensuite
Two separate living areas
3 other bedrooms
Open kitchen
Ducted gas heating
Evaporative cooling
Outside Features:
Large pergola for entertaining
Secure fencing
Quiet location
Well-designed drive through garage to accommodate a trailer or pop top caravan
A beautifully presented home in a quiet location still within proximity to schools, recreational facilities and all conveniences.

Description:
Step It Up on Crusoe
Perfectly elevated with views over the surrounds, this three-bedroom, brick veneer home has recently undergone a cosmetic update with fresh floor coverings and a new paint throughout.
- All three bedrooms are a good size with built in robes in each
- Bright and modern open plan kitchen/meals and lounge with reverse cycle split system heating and cooling
- Versatile second living at rear which could be a rumpus, kids play zone, study or separate dining
- Outside spaces include undercover pergola and decked entertaining area with low maintenance gardens.
- Under the house boasts another versatile space and includes a workshop with ample benchspace. Utilise the space which can be additional lockup carparking, home gym or transform into a modern living area opportunities are endless.
- Securely fenced with large front gate, convenience for a caravan parking.
Close to all amenities, public transport, Gurri Wanyarra Wellbeing Centre, recreation reserve, Centro Lansell and schools.

Description:
Living With Nature
Sitting on the back deck in the privacy of your own little oasis surrounded by nature is what is awaiting you here. This beautifully presented home offers three bedrooms and is in a sought-after area in Kangaroo Flat. All bedrooms have built-in robes and are light and airy. With a timber back deck running the length of the house you will be spoilt for choices for your summer dining or coffee spot. With a landscaped back yard the family will spend hours outdoors.
Inside Features:
Large main bedroom with built-in robe and access to the two-way bathroom
Large open plan lounge with reverse cycle heating and cooling
Dining area with direct access to the entertaining area
Master bedroom with sensational views to the rear yard
Built in robes to all bedrooms
Outside Features:
Secure fencing
Vehicle Side access to the back yard
Large timber deck for entertaining
Workshop with hot water service, power, water and air conditioner
Multiple options for both caravan and trailer storage
Off-street parking for many vehicles suits the multi car families
Positioned within a few minutes to Shopping, cafes, public transport, parks and schools this home is what you have been waiting for!

Description:
Entertainers Modern Haven.
INSPECTION BY APPOINTMENT CONTACT JESSE FORBES 0477277600
A beautifully refurbished home offering contemporary styling and entertainers' lifestyle welcome home to 87 Browning Street.
The owners have poured love and attention into the detailing of this property's modern refurbishment, and the moment you step inside you'll feel right at home.
Inside you're greeted by your light and bright open concept living, dining and kitchen with your master bedroom to the left.
The master offers plenty of natural light, a split system a walk-through robe into your two-piece ensuite.
The gourmet kitchen is sure to impress from its new quality appliances, marble look benchtops, subway tiling, an abundance of storage including soft close draws throughout and extra wide fridge nook.
The light filled neat bathroom services the remaining two bedrooms each featuring a split system, fans and built-in robes.
From the dining area can either use one door to have direct access to your large undercover double carport or step straight out into your impressive entertaining patio through the other.
This space is perfect for hosting parties and gatherings and even has its own bar area and café-style blinds.
Relax and unwind with friends on a warm summer's night while overlooking the kids running around the spacious backyard.
The shed-lover in the family will be impressed with the large 10.5m x 7m powered and concreted shed with generous 2.4m walls room enough for 6 vehicles.
Set on a quiet street and close to Kangaroo Flat's popular shops, healthcare and department stores and only 700 metres from both a primary and secondary schools, this property won't last long. An inspection is a must. Contact agent Jesse Forbes.

118m²

Description:
Private Inspections Available: Downsize or get on the property ladder!
**In response to the recent events, we are unable to schedule open for inspections. However, with the precautions our agents have in place, we are able to hold private inspections. If you would like to schedule a private inspection please contact our agents. We also have 3D tours of all of our properties as well as videos.
Our job is to help facilitate you in any way we can, as such if you require any further information, please don't hesitate to contact us.**

This large block with huge workshop is the perfect next step or the first step in your property journey. It is now available for the first time in 15 years.
Freshly painted and carpeted throughout, this is a large two-bedroom home with the rare offering of a bathroom for each bedroom.
Step into the entryway before entering the and light & bright living room. This leads through to kitchen with breakfast bar and on to the separate dining. Two large bedrooms, both with built-in robes, master with ensuite. Main bathroom with bath and separate toilet. Large laundry & ducted heating and cooling throughout as well as a 4kW solar panel system to lessen those power bills!
Lovingly established gardens that are neat as a pin, on the 822sqm block with suit the avid gardener or those wanting to grow their own fruit and veg!
The shed & workshop is a must-see, at almost 100sqm with its own power, plumbing and toilet, it suits the tradies and home DIYers alike. The double-wide entrance making it perfect for large storage solutions. Convert it into a rumpus room or run your home business from here!
The property is move-in ready but also has room for you to put your own flair.
Just 500 metres to Gurri Wanyarra Wellbeing Centre & The Kangaroo Flat Bushland Reserve.
Situated on the quiet john street, yet close enough to High street to walk to amenities.
Just 600m to Kangaroo Flat Primary, 800m to Crusoe Secondary College and 1,100m to St. Monica's Catholic Primary.
This property won't last, so please check out our virtual 3D walkthrough tour and contact Matt Ingram for your private inspection.

Address: 12 Clarcoll Crescent South Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555
Description:
New, Modern and Very Appealing
Located within walking distance of Lansell Square, and close to Kangaroo Flat shops, sporting amenities and schools, is this new and modern home ideally suited to first home buyers, retirees and investors.
With the home sited on a 300m2 allotment, this property is low-maintenance and will appeal to those looking for an easy-care lifestyle.
The Welsh-built home is value-packed, and a rare opportunity for first home buyers to capitalise on the $20,000 First Home Buyers' grant.
Or alternatively, investors could achieve an estimated rental return $360 per week.
Presented to perfection, there really isn't anything to do but move in immediately and enjoy your new home.
The well-designed floorplan consists of three bedrooms, two with built-in robes and the master with its own walk-in robe and well-finished ensuite.
The main bathroom (including separate shower and bath) services the rest of the house.
Quality flooring throughout leads to the heart of the home. The kitchen has good cupboard storage and quality appliances including dishwasher.
The central living area is a nice place to relax with ducted heating and reverse-cycle split-system cooling/heating, providing comfort all year round.
This property has so much to offer and there's so much more than meets the eye.
The only thing left to do is come and inspect.

Description:
Architect design with view-ti-full north-facing rear deck
Emanating a unique class & elegance, this stunning residence was architect designed to take full advantage of the aspect and terrain.
The result is a spacious home full of superior inclusions & finishes all completed to the highest standard.
Among its extensive list of features, it boasts tinted windows, high square-cut ceilings, granite kitchen benchtops, split system heating and air conditioning, efficient Scandinavian designed pellet heater & 3.7Kw solar power system.
Add the current owner's great eye for colour & decor & you have the epitome of stylish contemporary living.
The free-flowing floor plan begins with a boardwalk to the front entry where high ceilings overhead & polished hardwood timber floors underfoot give the first hint of what lies beyond.
First up is the master bedroom with a large walk-in-robe/dressing room opposite the revamped main bathroom with frameless shower, spa bath, vanity and WC. It's shared by two more robed bedrooms before the hallway opens up to the expansive, light-bathed, open living, dining & kitchen areas.
Entertaining & catering for family & friends will be a delight with a kitchen showcasing granite benches, 900mm gas/electric range, Miele dishwasher & three-door pantry.
Internal stairs lead to the lower-level fourth bedroom, bathroom, Euro-style laundry, study/home office area, roomy under-stair storage options & double garage access.
The interior is complemented by an extensive wrap-around, north-facing deck overlooking the sparkling in-ground pool & manicured gardens. Accessed through stacking sliding doors from the dining area, it can cater to a crowd when the occasion calls with a servery window to the kitchen, ceiling fans & fabulous city views.
Set on approx 737m² of land, the home is embraced by easy-care gardens with a side driveway to the basement garage and a second 6m x6m garage/workshop.
The convenient location is only footsteps to public transport, with shops, schools, railway station and other amenities within walking distance.
Like the well-known quote - "It's nice, it's different, it's unusual" - & it won't last long!
Book your inspection today.

Description:
WALK TO THE GURRI WANYARRA WELLBEING CENTER FROM YOUR NEW HOME AND ENJOY A GREAT LIFESTYLE!
Only 750 meters from the new Gurri Wanyarra wellbeing center, this near level 610m2 block is titled and ready to build on. With all the services available for connection and close to local shops, high school and primary school.
20 metre Street frontage allows great flexibility for building your design and having driveway access for your extra vehicle or Caravan.
Its a block not to be missed.

Address: 289 Mackenzie Street West Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555
Description:
Brick Veneer at a Weatherboard Price
This classic cream brick sensation sits perfectly between the Kangaroo Flat shops, shopping centres, medical clinics and directly opposite Crusoe College. Original and ready to be given its new lease of life, the home comprises 3 bedrooms, kitchen/meals area and L-shaped lounge with study nook. All bedrooms with built-in cupboards, wall-mounted air-conditioner and original 3-piece bathroom. Outside, the great sized allotment has a garage and carport.
